alert.note: Alert for Callahan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 22 at 11:48PM CDT until May 23 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CALLAHAN...BROWN AND NORTHEASTERN COLEMAN COUNTIES... At 1147 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lake Brownwood State Park, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Early around 1205 AM CDT. Brownwood and Camp Bowie around 1210 AM CDT. Zephyr around 1215 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Indian Creek, Owens and Thrifty. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
